The most powerful ANGULARJS and Bootstrap CSS based UI components make developer life easy

Complately MVVM structure, easy, light, fast, mobile friendly 25+ components and lots of native angular services.

Optimized and extended Bootstrap based CSS structure with pure CSS3 plugins.

You can find lots of examples and detailed documentations on online pages. Please click button below.
